details: Blur are an English rock band. The group consists of singer Damon Albarn (from Gorillaz), guitarist Graham Coxon, bassist Alex James and drummer Dave Rowntree.

challenge.text:
♫ (Woo-hoo) when I feel heavy metal
  (Woo-hoo) and I'm pins and I'm needles
 (Woo-hoo) well, I lie and I'm easy
  All of the time but I'm never sure why I need you
 Pleased to meet you ♫
